EmailTemplate.description: Every 5th day of every month an email reminder will be sent to the country manager, to request update of facts and figures (review and edit economic profile)
EmailTemplate.name: Currency Center Country Manager Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Currency Center Country Manager Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear [ Name of the Country Manager ],
Kindly ensure you that reviewed and updated the Currency Center with regards to country updates and additional information you may have.
Your last update for [Country] was [ Date ]
As a reminder, please be aware that you are able to update the Currency Center at all times with relevant country information and over [Number of users] airline users connect to the Currency Center for information when it comes to currency repatriation and IATA activities.
Kind regards Currency Center Team
